data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
In the minute 3, Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pacos de Ferreira.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Boavista in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Boavista have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 14, Angel Gomes (Boavista) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Paulinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Boavista.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tiago Martins signals a Boavista throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
In the minute 17, Yusupha Njie for the away team is judged to be offside.
Pacos Ferreira have a dangerous throw-in.
Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Boavista needs to be cautious. Pacos Ferreira have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Boavista.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Tiago Martins signals a Boavista throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 26, Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
In Pacos de Ferreira Pacos Ferreira drive forward through Luther Singh. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 28, Free kick in a good position for Boavista!
Yanis Hamache (Boavista) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
In the minute 30, Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Boavista.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira push forward at Estadio Capital do Movel and Marcelo gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Boavista defence.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Pacos Ferreira in Pacos de Ferreira.
Tiago Martins signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Boavista's half.
In the minute 35, Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Yusupha Njie of Boavista smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
In the minute 38, Can Pacos Ferreira capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Yanis Hamache (Boavista) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In Pacos de Ferreira, Douglas Tanque of Pacos Ferreira is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 40, Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Boavista.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 41, At Estadio Capital do Movel, Douglas Tanque has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in for Boavista at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 42, Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Tiago Martins awards Boavista a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Alberth Elis is booked for the away team.
Tiago Martins has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Boavista's Yusupha Njie gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Capital do Movel. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marcelo for Pacos Ferreira who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Pacos Ferreira's Marcelo looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 51, The match at Estadio Capital do Movel has been interrupted briefly for a check on Helder Ferreira, who is down injured.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Pacos de Ferreira to check on Javi Garcia, who is grimacing with pain.
Helder Ferreira returns to the field for Pacos Ferreira after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 52, Javi Garcia (Boavista) has received a first yellow card.
Javi Garcia is back on his feet again.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Oleg Reabciuk for Pacos Ferreira gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Boavista close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Boavista have a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Pacos Ferreira will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Boavista.
Important block from the Pacos Ferreira defence as Yanis Hamache fires in a strike for Boavista.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
In the minute 60, Boavista's Yanis Hamache misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Alberth Elis scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 61, That's a fine assist from Angel Gomes.
Throw-in Boavista.
Tiago Martins awards Boavista a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Mohamed Diaby is replacing Luiz Carlos for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 64, Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
Helder Ferreira (Pacos Ferreira) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Adriano.
Nuno Valente Santos is replacing Gustavo Sauer for the away team.
Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Boavista to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
In the minute 68, Jesus Gomez is on a sub for Cristian Devenish for Boavista.
Throw-in for Boavista at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 71, Tiago Martins signals a throw-in for Boavista, close to Pacos Ferreira's area.
Tiago Martins signals a Boavista throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pacos de Ferreira.
In the minute 73, Pacos Ferreira are pushing forward but Luther Singh's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio Capital do Movel.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in Boavista.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Boavista.
In the minute 75, Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Jesualdo Ferreira (Boavista) is making a third substitution, with Show replacing Yusupha Njie.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Boavista.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, The home team have replaced Bruno Costa with Uilton. This is the third substitution made today by Pepa.
Pepa is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Capital do Movel with Joao Pedro replacing Fernando Fonseca.
Throw-in for Boavista at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 82, Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
Tiago Martins signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Boavista's half.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 83, Joao Pedro is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Can Pacos Ferreira capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Boavista's half?
The home team replace Luther Singh with Joao Amaral.
In the minute 86, Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Boavista are coming forward and Yanis Hamache gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
In the minute 88, Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira just outside Boavista's area.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In Pacos de Ferreira Pacos Ferreira attack through Adriano. The finish is off target, however.
Boavista have a goal kick.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Can Pacos Ferreira capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Boavista's half?
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
